programme.sub-title: Atrasado Para O Show, Mas Pronto Para Lutar ...A Derradeira Tcnica Secreta Nasce!"

programme.title: Durante o combate, algum usou genjutsu para que todos na arena cassem no sono. Os ninjas da Areia, liderados por Orochimaru, comearam seu plano para destruir a Aldeia Oculta da Folha.
programme.desc: Naruto: Zero Hora! A Destruio Da Aldeia Da Folha Comea !
programme.sub-title: Zero Hora! A Destruio Da Aldeia Da Folha Comea !

programme.title: Os ninjas do Som e da Areia, juntos com Orochimaru, comearam a destruir a Aldeia Oculta da Folha. A arena se tornou em um campo de batalha.
programme.desc: Naruto: Aldeia Em Angstia: Uma Nova Misso Nvel A !
programme.sub-title: Aldeia Em Angstia: Uma Nova Misso Nvel A !

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar, (2011, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: O Jurssico, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Uma jovem cientista e sua equipe chegam a uma ilha misteriosa em busca de respostas sobre o que aconteceu com seu pai, que desapareceu l anos atrs.

programme.title: Apex, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Cinco caadores de elite so pagos para caar um homem em uma ilha deserta. Mas quando a presa comea a reagir, os papis de caador e presa trocam de lado

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City, (2021, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo, (2006, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Inferno na Montanha, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um pai e um filho tentam salvar os habitantes de uma pequena cidade de um desastre natural e do colapso de um tnel recm-construdo.

programme.title: O Ataque Dos Dinossauros, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Aps dois dinossauros desenvolvidos pelo exrcito americano atacarem uma pequena cidade das montanhas, cabe ao xerife local encontrar uma maneira de impedir que as criaturas destruam tudo a sua volta.

programme.title: Cobra Gigante, (2022, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Um professor de biologia tentando salvar sua filha doente com uma cura natural vai para a selva com especialistas e encontra um horror maior que a vida.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar, (2011, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: No Somos Anjos, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ned e Jim so prisioneiros em uma cadeia. Eles conseguem escapar quando um psicopata assassino, que estava para ser executado, mata dois guardas e fere outras pessoas. A dupla se esconde em uma cidade prxima, onde so confundidos com padres.

programme.title: A Difcil Arte de Amar, (1986, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Ela uma escritora que abandona sua carreira pelo amor sua famlia. Ele um colunista mulherengo que no consegue deixar seu passado de lado. E se essa combinao no um exemplo da difcil arte de amar, nada mais !

programme.title: O Resgate do Bandoleiro, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Depois de perder seu cavalo em uma aposta, Pat Brennan pega carona em uma diligncia que carregava os recm-casados Willard e Doretta Mims.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes em Washington, (1943, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes e Doutor Watson viajam para Washington D.C para impedir que um documento secreto caia em mos inimigas

programme.title: Segredos de uma Novela, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Sally Field lidera um elenco de estrelas neste engraadssimo divertido look numa novela de TV dominada por escndalos.

programme.title: As Namoradas do Papai, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A desbocada Amanda e a silenciosa e refinada Alyssa trocam identidades em um plano para aproximar Roger (pai de Alyssa) e Diana (assistente social de Amanda).

programme.title: Os Dois Super-Tiras em Miami, (1985, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Doug Bennet e Steve Forrest permaneceram amigos, mesmo depois que Steve deixou o FBI. Mas, para reuni-los, est Garret, um perigoso ex-presidirio em cujo caso os dois policiais trabalharam juntos.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: No fim do sculo 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violncia crescendo, at tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China 2, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Na sequncia do clssico, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta a seita White Lotus e protege o Dr. Sun Yat Sen, usando o Kung Fu para defender os inocentes na China em crise.

programme.title: Procura da Liberdade, (2021, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Dois homens separados por 100 anos esto unidos em sua busca pela liberdade. Em 1856, um escravo, Samuel Woodward e sua famlia, escapam da Plantao Monroe perto de Richmond, Virgnia.

programme.title: The Music of Silence, (2018, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme biogrfico sobre o tenor e msico italiano Andrea Bocelli. Apesar de ter nascido com um grave problema de viso que terminar em cegueira, Bocelli supera todos os tipos de obstculos, guiado por grandes ambies em relao sua paixo, a msica.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: O Caminho da F, (2019, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: O Caminho da F uma comdia alegre com o tema central: Deus no escolhe os capacitados, mas capacita os escolhidos.

programme.title: Julgamento, (2001, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Franco Macalousso tido como o salvador da humanidade, mas um grupo dissidente sabe sobre suas intenes satnicas. Quando uma das lderes da resistncia presa e vai a julgamento, o defensor encontra uma soluo inusitada: incluir Deus no processo.

programme.title: ltimos Dias no Deserto, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Durante os 40 dias de jejum e orao no deserto, Jesus luta contra o Diabo pelo destino de uma famlia em crise.

programme.title: Invencveis, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: A histria de quatro garotos amigos que tem a amizade ameaada aps um tiroteio que deixa um deles em coma (T.J.) e outro com um segredo (Brent). As consequncias da escolha de Brent deixam T.J. no hospital, e a alma de Brent em crise.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.title: Liquidao de Natal, (2013, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Basil e o motorista Nick dirigem-se ao corao das Montanhas Rochosas em um clima perigoso. Quando a jornada se torna potencialmente fatal, Basil deve decidir se est preparado para sacrificar sua vida por outra.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley's Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Ta squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.desc: One Piece

programme.sub-title: LUFFY IS THE ENEMY! THE ULTIMATE ZOMBIE VS. THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KNOCK HIM DOWN!! SPECIAL ATTACK: STRAW HAT DOCKING?

programme.title: Nami has a horrifying run in with Bartholomew Kuma, Perona becomes the latest lady to vanish, and Chopper, Franky, and Usopp team up to strike a blow against Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SILENT ASSAULT!! THE MYSTERIOUS VISTOR, "TYRANT" KUMA

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chlo's Bistro. Chlo is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.
programme.sub-title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.
programme.sub-title: The Bow, The Princess, and the Terrorist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.
programme.sub-title: 50th Anniversary Special - Is Lupin Still Burning?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #19: The Elusiveness of the Fog
programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #21: The Last Job
programme.desc: Lupin and his companions have their sights on a Japanese cultural treasure, a priceless Buddha statue. But when a mysterious group of ninja thieves get the jump on them, it might just be the gang's last job!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine, the devastatingly sexy lady thief who'll stop at nothing to make her steal, has her sights set on a religious cult's secret treasure when a new man waltzes into her life: Lupin III.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: Brightburn, (2019, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Life, (2017, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A team of scientists whose mission of discovery aboard the International Space Station turns into one of primal fear when they find a rapidly evolving life-form that caused extinction on Mars, and now threatens the crew and all life on Earth.

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect, (2015, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Action)

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: The Broken Star, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: A marshal murders a rancher for gold, but is foiled by his assistant.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Drama)

programme.title: The Tin Star, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Ben Owens, a greenhorn sheriff who hasnt worn his badge long... and wont live to wear it much longer unless he gets some savvy help.

programme.title: The Iron Sheriff, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Sterling Hayden plays a sheriff with continuing moral dilemmas. Should he relate a deathbed confession which falsely implicates his son in a murder? Should he carry out his threat to cold-bloodedly kill the real murderer or bring him to legal justice?

programme.title: What Women Want, (2000, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Screwball)

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2, (2017, Screwball)
programme.desc: When it comes to raising their kids, Dusty (Mark Wahlberg) and Brad (Will Ferrell) finally have this co-parenting thing down. That is, until their dads come to town, putting their newfound partnership to the ultimate test in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: Enquanto Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se preparam para a prova, um ninja chamado Rock Lee aparece. Lee quer lutar contra Sasuke, que possui o poder do cl Uchiha. Sasuke aceita o desafio de Lee, mas fica s na defesa devido aos ataques rpidos desse oponente.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke - S1E22

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se inscrevem oficialmente para a Prova Chunin e formam um time. Para passar, nenhum membro pode falhar.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam - S1E23

programme.title: Naruto e sua equipe iniciam a primeira prova. O examinador Ibiki Morino, um jonin (ninja de alto nvel) notrio e perito em interrograo. Sasuke e Sakura esto preocupados, pois se Naruto responder tudo errado, eles tambm falharo.
programme.desc: Naruto: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea - S1E24

programme.title: A parte mais difcil da prova comea na pergunta 10. Antes dos ninjas escutarem a pergunta, Ibiki coloca uma regra injusta para o problema: quem responder errado ser reprovado e no ter o direito de fazer qualquer Prova Chunin no futuro.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada - S1E25

programme.title: Konohamaru, neto do Terceiro Hokage da Aldeia da Folha, aparece durante a Prova Chunin com Moegi e Udon e cobre eventos para o jornal da Academia Ninja. Ele v Naruto como um irmo mais velho e, entrevistando os personagens, reconta suas aventuras.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Floresta Da Morte - S1E26

programme.title: Na floresta da morte comea a segunda parte da Prova Chunin. Cada time recebe um tipo de pergaminho e deve roubar o outro tipo de outro time, chegando ao ponto final na torre com os dois pergaminhos.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte - S1E27

programme.title: A segunda parte da prova comea na floresta da morte. Sasuke nota que um inimigo se disfarou de Naruto. Sasuke salva e desamarra Naruto, e os trs membros criam uma senha para quando ficarem separados outra vez.
programme.desc: Naruto: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta - S1E28

programme.title: O ataque do ninja da Grama poderoso demais para Sasuke e Sakura. Sasuke pensa em entregar o pergaminho, mas Naruto o impede. A raiva de Naruto cresce e seus poderes so revelados.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda! - S1E29

programme.title: Ao ver Naruto lutar contra o ninja da Grama, Sasuke percebe que estava errado em fugir. Sasuke usa todo o potencial do seu Sharingan para afastar o ninja. Ele se apresenta como Orochimaru, some e deixa uma Marca da Maldio em Sasuke, que cai em dor.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago - S1E30

programme.title: Depois de ver a reportagem, Anko percebe um intruso na prova, Orochimaru, mas no consegue det-lo. Sakura, cansada e com medo, tenta impedir o inimigo. O autoproclamado demnio bonito da Aldeia da Folha, Rock Lee, aparece para o resgate!
programme.desc: Naruto: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo - S1E31

programme.title: Protegendo Sakura, que no consegue mais se mover, Lee luta contra os trs ninja do Som. Ele usa sua habilidade secreta, mas ineficaz. Dosu o ataca, e Lee cai. Para proteger as pessoas que so importantes para ela, Sakura se levanta...
programme.desc: Naruto: Sakura Floresce - S1E32

programme.title: Enquanto Sakura se defende dos ninjas do Som sozinha, o time rival Ino aparece! Depois de ver Sakura lutar contra os ninjas do Som, eles decidem ajud-la. Com a formao de batalha "Ino-Shika-Cho", o time Ino tenta deter os atacantes
programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho - S1E33

programme.title: Os ninjas do Som partem depois de enfrentar o poder de Sasuke. O time de Naruto tem um momento para se recuperar. Kiba consegue o segundo pergaminho e seu time vai em direo torre. O parceiro canino de Kiba, Akamaru, nota algo adiante e para.
programme.desc: Naruto: Akamaru Treme: A Fora Cruel De Gaara - S1E34

programme.title: Naruto e a equipe finalmente descansam. J se passaram quatro dias desde o incio da prova, restando apenas um para o fim. Naruto sugere duplicar o pergaminho do cu, que ainda precisam ter, e tenta abrir o pergaminho da terra, supostamente selado.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, No Permitido Olhar - S1E35

programme.title: O time de Naruto se junta a Kabuto, mas eles so presos por um genjutsu (tcnica ilusria). Eles caminham na mesma rea vrias vezes, perdem energia e lutam contra os vrios clones criados pela tcnica. Naruto os derrota, mas o nmero no diminui.
programme.desc: Naruto: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus So Melhores Que Os Seus - S1E36

programme.title: Quando Naruto e seu time chegam a torre e abrem os dois pergaminhos, Iruka aparece e explica o esprito do ninja chunin (nvel mdio) aos estudantes da Academia Ninja. Agora ele confia em Naruto e seu time. Anko fala com o Hokage sobre Orochimaru.
programme.desc: Naruto: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez - S1E37

programme.title: Os 21 ninjas que passaram na segunda parte da prova se juntam para o prximo desafio. Seus rostos demonstram vrias emoes profundas. Mas como um nmero muito alto passou na segunda prova, as preliminares da terceira comearo imediatamente...
programme.desc: Naruto: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao! - S1E38

programme.title: Na terceira prova os combates so um contra um. O primeiro entre Sasuke e Yoroi, o capanga de Orochimaru. Yoroi encurrala Sasuke, que no consegue usar seu Sharingan por causa da Marca da Maldio no pescoo. Yoroi absorve o chakra para fora de Sasuke.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Cime Do Sobrancelhudo, A Rajada De Lees Se Solta! - S1E39

programme.title: Kakashi desfaz o feitio de Sasuke, e Orochimaru aparece. Ele quer o poder de Sharingan que o cl Uchiha possui. Nas preliminares da terceira prova, Zaku da Aldeia Escondida do Som luta contra Shino da Aldeia Oculta da Folha.
programme.desc: Naruto: Kakashi E Orochimaru Cara A Cara - S1E40

programme.title: O prximo combate entre o membro do time de Gaara, Kankuro, e o capanga de Orochimaru, Misumi. Misumi captura Kankuro, usando um corpo que consegue deslocar suas partes e juntas.
programme.desc: Naruto: Exploso Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam - S1E41

programme.title: O quarto combate entre Sakura e Ino, amigas de infncia e ambas apaixonadas por Sasuke. Embora Sakura tenha admirado Ino desde pequena, ela no hesita em enfrent-la, e as duas ninjas aparentam ter o mesmo nvel e determinao.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Final: Cha! - S1E42

programme.title: O quinto combate entre Tenten e Temari. Tenten, mestre em armas areas e vrias outras, que so repelidas pelo leque de Temari. O sexto combate entre Shikamaru e Kin. Kin parece estar em vantagem, mas Shikamaru usa seu Jutsu Possesso da Sombra.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Kunoichi Assassina E Um Trmulo Shikamaru - S1E43

programme.desc: Atravs dos resultados da anlise dos insetos parasitrios cristalizados, os inimigos atualmente lutando com a equipe kakashi so identificados como usurios do estilo cristal, um tipo raro de jutsu.

programme.desc: Chegam os reforos da aldeia da folha. A nova misso de tsunade: selar a besta de trs caudas assim no cair nas mos de qualquer outro e capturar yukimaru cujos poderes esto ligados nesta.

programme.desc: Os ninjas da folha querem selar a besta de trs caudas, e guren quer impedi-los de fazer isso, a qualquer preo.

programme.desc: Para proteger a barreira de selamento de quatro pontas necessria para selar a besta de trs caudas, kakashi e naruto enfrentar uma mortal batalha contra guren

programme.desc: Para proteger guren da raivosa trs caudas, yukimaru usa poderes alm de seus limites. Comovida pela gesto dele, guren lamenta pelo seu pecado no passado de ter matado a me de yukimaru

programme.desc: Torn between his biological family and the gang he now calls his own, a man has to make a choice.

programme.desc: Desperate to raise money for his daughters cancer treatment, a retired bull rider teams up with his estranged son to orchestrate a robbery. However, they must soon outwit the local police if they want to keep the cash and their freedom.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: The Road (2009)

programme.title: Virtuosity (1995)

programme.title: The Untouchables (1987)
programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy Citys police force.

programme.desc: An ex-cop doing prison time chases a virtual-reality killer from the program onto the Los Angeles streets.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.
